original_text: uncommonly stylish but equally silly . . . the picture fails to generate much suspense , nor does it ask searching enough questions to justify its pretensions .
generated_text:
1. "A visually stunning but narratively shallow film that struggles to maintain tension and neglects to explore its themes deeply."
